javaslang.control

Class Match.MatchBuilder<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javaslang.control.Match.MatchBuilder<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - Return type of the Match
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Match.OrElseBuilder
    Enclosing class:
    Match<R>

    public abstract static class Match.MatchBuilder<R>
extends Object
    An abstract Match builder providing base methods for the internal Match builder DSL.
    Since:
    1.0.0

      • build

        public Match<R> build()
        Finally used by a Match builder to build the Match instance.
        Returns:
        a new Match consisting of the cases specified before.

        Returns:
